message: Bye Live Messenger :D RT @readify: Microsoft confirms Messenger will be retired and users migrated to Skype on March 15 http://t.co/uE9GcYx7
name: Microsoft confirms Messenger will be retired and users migrated to Skype on March 15
caption: thenextweb.com
description: Microsoft on Tuesday started mass emailing its 100 million+ Messenger users to let them know that the service is officially being retired on March 15, 2013. On that date, all users ...
